TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit X509SigningCredentials extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials

Docs.summary: 表示做為簽署憑證的 X.509 權杖。
根據指定的 X.509 憑證初始化 類別的新執行個體。

MemberSignature.Value: public X509SigningCredentials (System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 certificate);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 certificate) cil managed
Public Sub New (certificate As X509Certificate2)
public: X509SigningCredentials(System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2 ^ certificate);

Docs.summary: 根據指定的 X.509 憑證初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，這個建構函式會使用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause>來產生安全性金鑰識別碼。

MemberSignature.Value: public X509SigningCredentials (System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 certificate, System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier ski);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 certificate, class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier ski) cil managed
Public Sub New (certificate As X509Certificate2, ski As SecurityKeyIdentifier)
public: X509SigningCredentials(System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2 ^ certificate, System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityKeyIdentifier ^ ski);

Docs.summary: 根據指定的 X.509 憑證和安全性金鑰識別項，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援 Windows Communication Foundation 來產生參考的安全性金鑰識別碼的金鑰識別碼子句類型<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>是<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause>， <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause>， <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause>，和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause>。 不過，若要啟用自訂的情況下，這個建構函式不會執行任何驗證用來產生所提供的安全性金鑰識別碼子句型別`ski`參數。

MemberSignature.Value: public X509SigningCredentials (System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 certificate, string signatureAlgorithm, string digestAlgorithm);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 certificate, string signatureAlgorithm, string digestAlgorithm) cil managed
Public Sub New (certificate As X509Certificate2, signatureAlgorithm As String, digestAlgorithm As String)
public: X509SigningCredentials(System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2 ^ certificate, System::String ^ signatureAlgorithm, System::String ^ digestAlgorithm);

Docs.summary: 根據指定的 X.509 憑證、簽章演算法和摘要演算法，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，這個建構函式會使用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause>來產生安全性金鑰識別碼。

MemberSignature.Value: public X509SigningCredentials (System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 certificate, System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier ski, string signatureAlgorithm, string digestAlgorithm);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 certificate, class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier ski, string signatureAlgorithm, string digestAlgorithm) cil managed
Public Sub New (certificate As X509Certificate2, ski As SecurityKeyIdentifier, signatureAlgorithm As String, digestAlgorithm As String)

public: X509SigningCredentials(System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2 ^ certificate, System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityKeyIdentifier ^ ski, System::String ^ signatureAlgorithm, System::String ^ digestAlgorithm);

Docs.summary: 根據指定的 X.509 憑證、安全性金鑰識別項、簽章演算法和摘要演算法，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援 Windows Communication Foundation 來產生參考的安全性金鑰識別碼的金鑰識別碼子句類型<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>是<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause>， <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause>， <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause>，和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause>。 不過，若要啟用自訂的情況下，這個建構函式不會執行任何驗證用來產生所提供的安全性金鑰識別碼子句型別`ski`參數。

.property instance class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 Certificate
Public ReadOnly Property Certificate As X509Certificate2
public: property System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2 ^ Certificate { System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2 ^ get(); };
